nodes.bodyText: Should this be "load-data" to be consistent with "step-definitions"? And shouldn't "flows" be in this list?

I'm also wondering how aware HubProject should be of every artifact type. Could some other class make a call to ML to get a list of all the artifact types, and then pass that list of objects to HubProject, which would then initialize a directory for each one, using the name/type of the artifact as the directory name?
I'm thinking right now of all the places that need to be modified in order to define a new artifact type. Ideally, that's just one place - the ArtifactService in ML.
